Description: Two joining fragments of flattened handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-brown. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Production date: 165 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 142.)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (46)
